maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Girl, you're interfering with our epic stare down!
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Madame, vous êtes en train de perturber notre duel de celui qui fixera l'autre le plus longtemps !
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.note: name of this shit game in french ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Just put the present here. This is not the first time this has happened to me.
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Met juste le cadeau ici. Ce n'est pas la première fois que ça m'arrive.

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Every major holiday someone brings me a gift. Different player each time. Super weird.
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: À chaque grande vacance quelqu'un m'apporte un cadeau. Toujours un joueur différent à chaque fois. C'est super étrange.

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Well... Bye...
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Bon alors... Bye...

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: A perfectly regular stone
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Un rocher parfaitement régulier

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Nice view from here!
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: On a une belle vue d'ici !

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: So many waterfalls! Kind of makes you want to jump into the water.
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Tant de cascades d'eaux ! Ça donne envie de sauter dans l'eau.

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Except it's cold. And avatars can't swim. And you really shouldn't swim near waterfalls.
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Sauf que c'est froid. Et que les avatars peuvent pas nager. Et que c'est une mauvaise idée de nager près des cascades.

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Why did I think that was a good idea again?
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Pourquoi est-ce que je pensais que c'était une bonne idée, déjà ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: You'd think they'd place something unique and interesting on this spot.
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: On aurait pu penser qu'ils mettraient quelque chose d'unique et d'intéressant ici.

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: It's just a \c[3]regular\c[0] rock, though.
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Mais c'est juste un rocher complètement \c[3]banal\c[0].

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Such a \c[3]perfectly regular\c[0] stone here, don't you agree Lea?
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: C'est vraiment un rocher \c[3]parfaitement réguler\c[0], tu ne trouves pas, Lea ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Tricky laser bridge!!
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Un pont laser piégeux !!

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Bill Masters
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Bill Masters
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.note: probably ref to halo, check halo trans

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: HAHA, take that you traitorous piles of snow!
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: HAHA, prends ça, traitre des neiges !

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Yes, excellent work, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. It seems like you mopped them up nicely.
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Oui, excellent travail, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. On dirait que vous avez tout bien nettoyé.

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: And you secured that location tracking device that those winter soldiers dropped.
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Et tu as mis en sécurité l'appareil de localisation que ces soldats d'hiver ont laissé derrière eux.

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: It should lead you straight to the facility which created all that wonderful weaponry.
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Il devrait te mener tout droit vers l'usine où toutes ces merveilleuses armes ont été produites.

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: You should locate it and mount a full assault immediatly, to secure the weapons for the use of mankind!
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Vous devriez commencer dès maintenant et mener un assaut frontal immédiatement, pour sécuriser ces armes et les rendre à l'humanité !

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Good.\. You know what to do.\. Dismissed!
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Bien.\. Vous savez quoi faire.\. Rompez !

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Bye.
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Bye.

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: Key Applied
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: Clef Appliquée

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: en_US
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: fr_FR

maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.orig: en_US
maps/bergen-trail/path-6.json/entities/6.text: fr_FR
